feed.title: Cypht Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cypht: v2.3.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update Cypht Docker version by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1180
  • [FIX] ensure the email address part is the only value captured when allowing the display of external resources from a particular sender by @jacob-js in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1166
  • Merge tag v2.2.0 into 2.x by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1182
  • Autocrypt messages encrept automatically by @David-Muhasa in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1183
  • Define constant for theme path by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1185
  • [EHN]Email filtering: Cypht Sieve filters: Better handling of 'Stop processing more rules' by @christer77 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1098
  • [Fix] Add error message for a missing database connexion by @GedeonTS in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1188
  • [FIX]Profiles: Fixing undefined array key rmk on Profiles page by @Baraka24 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1190
  • [EHN]Like Gmail, warn if you are about to reply to a new contact (and perhâ€¦ by @christer77 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1065
  • [FIX]Site Settings/General/:Warn for Unsaved Changes parameter once set cannot be unset by @Baraka24 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1179
  • Merge master(fixes) to 2.x by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1192
  • implement-screen-email by @christer77 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1132
  • Fix undeclared properties in hm-feed.php by @josaphatim in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1085
  • Correct Broken folder_list selenium tests by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1189
  • Make bootstrap icons available on dockerized installs by @indridieinarsson in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1203
  • [UDP] Sieve: Update php-sieve-manager to latest version 1.0.8 by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1206
  • Update fixes before release by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1208
  • Update release token by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1210

New Contributors

  • @GedeonTS made their first contribution in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1188
  • @indridieinarsson made their first contribution in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1203

Full Changelog: https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/compare/v2.2.0...v2.3.0

entry.title: New release for Cypht: v2.4.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update release token by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1209
  • Udpdate docker version to 2.3.0 by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1211
  • Check for null in quota-root. Some servers yield null values here by @indridieinarsson in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1202
  • Fixed attachment dir when config type is set to DB by @josaphatim in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1205
  • Update database credentials in docker-compose.dev.yaml for local development by @Yannick243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1215
  • Fix Docker theme css path by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1214
  • Remove Jason's email and instead invite people to the chat room by @David-Muhasa in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1220
  • Fixed background in tiki by @josaphatim in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1223
  • Fix forms width for tiki integration by @josaphatim in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1225
  • [FIX][UI] Adjust the searcbar's width by @GedeonTS in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1226
  • Merge master to 2.x by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1227
  • Comment reload_folder_list that will be reviewed after by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1228
  • [FIX] block_list page: reviewing unblock and block actions by @christer77 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1213
  • Fix default_settings configured from .env file by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1158
  • fix multibyte handling in imap literals and address splitting, improve unit tests by @kroky in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1230
  • Removed some styling not necessary after bootstrap 5 integration that break themes by @josaphatim in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1232
  • Merge to 2.x 1 by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1231
  • Always show spinner when copying/moving to mailbox by @josaphatim in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1235
  • Adding bulk-import accounts using csv sample file by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/976
  • Fixed broken module keyboard shortcuts by @josaphatim in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1237
  • [FIX]Compose page: clicking on Send button can't send email by @Baraka24 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1219
  • Merge master to 2.x by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1242
  • Correct undefined const DEFAULT_NO_PASSWORD_SAVE in docker by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1244

Full Changelog: https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/compare/v2.3.0...v2.4.0

entry.title: New release for Cypht: v1.4.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [UDP] Sieve: Update php-sieve-manager to latest version 1.0.8 by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1207
  • [UPD] update composer.lock to fix league outdated dependencies by @Yannick243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1234
  • Fixed keyboard shortcuts by @josaphatim in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1238
  • Added imap account name as part of error message by @josaphatim in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1336
  • fix(backend): ensure attachments are sent along when forwarding an email by @mercihabam in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1407

Full Changelog: https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/compare/v1.4.4...v1.4.5

entry.title: New release for Cypht: v1.4.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • docs(other): remove duplication for installation notes by @Baraka24 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1475
  • docs(other): Fix screenshot display readme by @Baraka24 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1476
  • [UPD] update henrique-borba/php-sieve-manager to 1.0.9 by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1482
  • update(feature): sieve manager to latest release by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1487
  • feat(other): add strip_dns_prefetch_tags for the html by @Baraka24 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1492

Full Changelog: https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/compare/v1.4.5...v1.4.6

entry.title: New release for Cypht: v2.4.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Correct undefined const DEFAULT_NO_PASSWORD_SAVE in Docker by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1243
  • Update docker image to latest version released v2.4.0 by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1248
  • Allow the execution of a presave draft handler, enabling third-party software integrating with Cypht to customize how a draft is stored by @mercihabam in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1247
  • [FIX]setup_database.php: Check if the required MySQL extensions are loaded by @Baraka24 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1251
  • [FIX]hm-smtp.php: Initialize to avoid undefined variable warning by @Baraka24 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1250
  • [FIX]Imap quota: fixing quota appears more than once by @Baraka24 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1218
  • Fix quota appears more than once 2x by @Baraka24 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1255
  • [FIX] Make server page responsive by @Bienvenumoringa in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1240
  • Fix reload_folder_list browser test by @indridieinarsson in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1253
  • [Fix]Extension check introduced for Docker builds by @goldenmean58 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1258
  • [FIX] Make the send button enabled on compose page by @GedeonTS in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1246
  • Improve messages caching to ensure a message isn't fetched more than once when viewing its content by @mercihabam in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1252
  • Add linux/arm64 and linux/386 architectures building by @rodriguezny in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1261
  • Fixed AllInkl provider in Cypht V2 by @josaphatim in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1260
  • Add linux/arm/v7 and linux/arm/v6 building by @rodriguezny in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1262
  • Automate running local tests by @jonocodes in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1042
  • Fix phpunit command according to 1042 by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1263
  • Include js_modules files content in the final generated site.js by @mercihabam in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1264
  • Added code to raise exception on database errors by @josaphatim in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1257
  • Should be off by default | Address the controversial part in read recâ€¦ by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1181
  • [FIX]Blocklist:can not edit a block by @christer77 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1079
  • [FIX]hm-smtp.php: Declare properties to avoid deprecated dynamic propâ€¦ by @Baraka24 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1249
  • [FIX]hm-smtp.php: Declare properties to avoid deprecated dynamic propâ€¦ by @Baraka24 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1271
  • Fix executing handler sieve filters enabled message content when server is configured without sieve by @josaphatim in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1268
  • [FIX]apache errors in its log:Already registered module for compose re-attempted: load_contacts AND Already registered module for contacts re-attempted: process_import_contact by @christer77 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1167
  • [FIX]hm-mime-message.php: Replace the mb_convert_encoding() function â€¦ by @Baraka24 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1272
  • [FIX]hm-mime-message.php: Replace the mb_convert_encoding() function â€¦ by @Baraka24 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1280
  • [FIX] output_modules.php : fixing Call to a member function get() on null by @Bienvenumoringa in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1276
  • [ENH] Implement Expose IMAP capabilities for sharing folders by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1270
  • [FIX] modules.php PHP Warning Undefined array key of redirect uri andâ€¦ by @amaninyumu1 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1254
  • Correct ajax_imap_accept_special_folders condition on quick_servers_setup by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1283
  • Disable duplicate redis extension from Github actions by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1284
  • Implement browser history API based navigation, preventing page reloads between routings by @mercihabam in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1266
  • [FIX]Imap quota: Fixing quota appears only once folders are expanded by @Baraka24 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1275
  • Correct settings.py & tags.py selenium tests and uncomment it by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1193
  • Fix selenium load_settings_page test by @josaphatim in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1286
  • merge all to 2.x by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1273
  • [FIX]Fix deprecated warnings for preg_match() and mb_strtolower() in â€¦ by @Baraka24 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1318
  • [FIX]Bulk-import accounts using yaml or csv template: Allow both textâ€¦ by @Baraka24 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1319
  • [FIX].env.example: DISABLE_ORIGIN_CHECK assigns twice by @Baraka24 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1320
  • [DOC]Dev Page: Reviewing documentation links by @Baraka24 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1361
  • [FIX]DEFAULT_TEXT_ONLY value must be false by @Baraka24 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1362
  • docs(other): remove duplication for installation notes by @Baraka24 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1474
  • feat(other): add HTML email sanitizer to remove external background iâ€¦ by @Baraka24 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1513

Full Changelog: https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/compare/v2.4.0...v2.4.1
